data.title: Ethernet Vendor Addresses
data.text:
Here is a list of known Ethernet Vendor Addresses. FTP Software cannot guarantee the accuracy or currency of any of the information in these files. Entries that have been reported to us, but are unconfirmed, are denoted by a question mark (?) after the name. If you have updates or additions to this list, you can E-mail them to info@ftp.com.
